args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{"result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Steering Damper May Fail

BMW of North America, LLC (BMW) is recalling certain 2024-2025 M 1000 XR, and M 1000 R motorcycles.  The steering damper may have a loose valve pin within the housing, which can cause an unexpected increase in steering effort.An unexpected increase in steering effort can result in a loss of control, increasing the risk of a crash.

Number of Units Affected: 51.0
